      • start

        public void start()
        1. Compiles a list of classes that will be stored inside this container:
          • Reads the configuration from the properties
          • Looks for component declarations in the classpath: META-INF/services/orbit/*
        2. Instantiates all the components
        3. Wires the components together by injecting fields and the configuration
        4. Calls @PostConstructor on all components
        5. Calls start on all components that implement Startable

      • stop

        public void stop()
